translations.chinese: 今吏六百石以上父母妻子與同居，及故吏嘗佩將軍都尉印將兵及佩二千石官印者，家唯給軍賦，他無有所與。
translations.english: Now officials of six hundred piculs and above have their parents, wives, and children living with them, and former officials who once wore general or commandery commander seals and led troops and wore seals of two thousand piculs, their families only provide military levies, otherwise have no other levies.
He commanded the commanderies and feudal lords to establish high temples.

translations.chinese: 元年冬十二月，趙隱王如意薨。
translations.english: In the first year, winter, twelfth month, King Yin of Zhao Ruyi passed away.

translations.chinese: 民有罪，得買爵三十級以免死罪。
translations.english: People who had crimes could purchase thirty ranks to be exempted from death penalty.
He granted the people ranks, one rank per household.
